name: Aave / C.R.E.A.M. Lender Optimizer
description: Supplies {{token}} to [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) and [C.R.E.A.M.](https://app.cream.finance/) to generate interest and earn staked AAVE tokens. Once unlocked, earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Aave / C.R.E.A.M. Lender Optimizer
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) and [C.R.E.A.M.](https://app.cream.finance/) to generate interest and earn staked AAVE tokens. Once unlocked, earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Aave / C.R.E.A.M. Lender Optimizer
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) et [CREAM](https://app.cream.finance/) pour générer des intérêts et gagner des jetons AAVE stakés. Une fois déverrouillés, les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Aave / C.R.E.A.M. Lender Optimizer
es.description: Suministra {{token}} a [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) y [C.R.E.A.M.](https://app.cream.finance/) para generar intereses y ganar tokens AAVE en staking. Una vez desbloqueados, los tokens ganados se cosechan y se venden por más {{token}} que se depositan nuevamente en la estrategia.

de.name: Aave / C.R.E.A.M. Lender Optimizer
de.description: Supplies {{token}} to [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) and [C.R.E.A.M.](https://app.cream.finance/) to generate interest and earn staked AAVE tokens. Once unlocked, earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

tr.name: Aave / C.R.E.A.M. Lender Optimizer
tr.description: Faiz oluşturmak ve stake edilen AAVE jetonlarını kazanmak için [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) ve [C.R.E.A.M.](https://app.cream.finance/)'a {{token}} sağlar. Kilidi açıldıktan sonra, kazanılan jetonlar hasat edilir, stratejiye geri yatırılmak üzere daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır.

vi.name: Aave / C.R.E.A.M. Lender Optimizer
vi.description: Supplies {{token}} to [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) and [C.R.E.A.M.](https://app.cream.finance/) to generate interest and earn staked AAVE tokens. Once unlocked, earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Aave / C.R.E.A.M. Lender Optimizer
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 存入 [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) 和 [C.R.E.A.M.](https://app.cream.finance/) 以赚取利率和质押的 AAVE 代币。收获奖励后，卖掉换为更多的 {{token}} 再进行复投。

hi.name: Aave / C.R.E.A.M. Lender Optimizer
hi.description: {{token}} से [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) और [C.R.E.A.M.](https://app.cream.finance/) की आपूर्ति ब्याज उत्पन्न करने और AAVE टोकन अर्जित करता है। एक बार अनलॉक होने के बाद, अर्जित टोकन काटा जाता है, और अधिक {{token}} में बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।
